host.label: Management IP address or Hostname
host.description: Specify the IP address or  hostname of the data source so that IBM Cloud Pak for Security can communicate with it

help.label: Need additional help?
help.description: More details on the data source setting can be found in the specified link

result_limit.label: The Result limit for the connector
result_limit.description: The total number of results returned from the connector

quota_threshold.label: The quota limit for the API
quota_threshold.description: Prevents the connector from exceeding the quota threshold limit

tenant.label: Tenant
tenant.description: Tenant Id of Palo Alto Cortex XDR Application

api_key.label: API Key
api_key.description: The API Key is a unique identifier required for authenticating API calls.

api_key_id.label: API Key Id
api_key_id.description: The API Key ID is a unique token used to authenticate the API Key
